Uses of Class
xtc.tree.Annotation

  • Packages that use Annotation 
    Package Description
    xtc.lang
    Language-specific support for C and Java.
    xtc.tree
    xtc's support for abstract syntax trees and for traversing them with visitors.

    • Uses of Annotation in xtc.lang

      Fields in xtc.lang declared as Annotation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Annotation CParserState.annotation
      The current annotation, if any.
      Annotation CParserState.Context.mark
      The marked annotation, if any.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Comment
      A source code comment.
      class  Formatting
      An annotation capturing source code formatting.
      class  LineMarker
      A line marker (as used by GCC).
      class  Pragma
      A pragma.
      class  SourceIdentity
      A source identity marker.
